original_text: And the children of Israel set forward, and pitched in the plains of Moab on this side Jordan by Jericho.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 또 길을 떠나 모압 평지에 진을 쳤으니 요단 건너편 곧 여리고 맞은편이더라

sentences.original_text: And the children of Israel set forward
and pitched in the plains of Moab
on this side Jordan by Jericho
